text: George C. Hasay (February 7, 1948 â€“ February 8, 2021) was an American politician. He was a Republican member of the Pennsylvania House of Representatives from 1973 to 2006. Hasay died on February 8, 2021, after a brief illness in Ross Township, Pennsylvania, one day after his 73rd birthday. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Members of the Pennsylvania General Assembly Category:Politicians from Pennsylvania Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: George Hasay
